orm.title: Shipping price by weight
orm.items: [{"widget":"13","id":"zones","title":"Zones:","sql":"SELECT t1.id AS `key`, t1.title AS value, t1.parentId AS parentId FROM ShippingZone AS t1 WHERE t1.status = 1  ORDER BY t1.title"},{"widget":"11","id":"id","title":"Title:","sql":""},{"widget":"0","id":"basePrice","title":"$:","sql":""},{"widget":"0","id":"baseWeight","title":"Up to unit(s):","sql":""},{"widget":"0","id":"extraPrice","title":"$:","sql":""},{"widget":"0","id":"extraWeight","title":"Per extra unit(s):","sql":""}]
